Metarace : Cycle Race Astractions

Scripts:

	metarace	event browser
	trackmeet	track meet handler
	roadrace	road race, criterium, handicap & cross handler
	roadtt		road time trial handler
	sportif		mass participation event
	stagebuild	road event configuration tool
	report_tool	create printed report from csv data

	road_announce	road event announncer screen
	roadtt_announce	road tt event announcer screen
	roadtt_start	time trial start clock
	track_announce	track meet announcer screen
	rtimerd		timer/decoder aggregation tool

	mbrfind		search names database
	update_namebank	import data to the names database
	dump_namebank	dump the contents of the names database as csv
	woodchop	timing package for Stihl Woodsports

	gfxpanel	video wall scoreboard emulation
	hl970		hl970 display manager road & track
	lapboard	per category lap counter (hl970 vertical)
	microtab	microtab road race display manager
